mapper.sql: id, name, number, shipFromAddressID, labelPrepType,AreCasesRequired, amazongroupid, marketplaceid, warehouseid, shopid, plansubid,auditstatus, remark,createdate, creator, opttime, operator
mapper.select: SELECT sum(case when auditstatus=1 then 1 else 0 END) needapply, sum(case when auditstatus>1 then 1 else 0 END) needprocess from t_erp_ship_v2_inboundplan WHERE shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND auditstatus>=1 AND auditstatus <=7

select count(si.sku) skucount, sum(si.quantity) toquantity, max(sp.name) name, sum(dd.weight*si.quantity) readweight, max(dd.weight_units) readunit, sum(case when ifnull(dd.length,0)*ifnull(dd.width,0)*ifnull(dd.height,0)/5000 > dd.weight then ifnull(dd.length,0)*ifnull(dd.width,0)*ifnull(dd.height,0)/5000*si.Quantity else dd.weight*si.quantity end) weight, SUM(case when ifnull(m.boxnum,0) > 0 and ifnull(dm2.id,0) > 0 then ifnull(ifnull(si.Quantity/m.boxnum,0)*(dm2.length*dm2.width*dm2.height),0)/1000000 else ifnull(si.Quantity*(dd.length*dd.width*dd.height),0)/1000000 end) boxvolume, max(dd.weight_units) weightunit, sum(m.price*si.quantity) itemprice , max(sp.remark) remark from t_erp_ship_v2_inbounditem si left join t_erp_ship_v2_inboundplan sp on sp.id=si.formid left join t_marketplace mkt on mkt.marketplaceid=sp.marketplaceid left join t_amazon_auth auth on auth.id=sp.amazonauthid left join t_product_info pro on pro.marketplaceid=sp.marketplaceid and pro.sku=si.sku and pro.amazonAuthId=auth.id left join t_product_in_opt o on o.pid=pro.id left join t_erp_material m on m.sku=ifnull(o.msku,pro.sku) and m.shopid=sp.shopid and m.isDelete=0 left join t_dimensions dd on dd.id=m.pkgDimensions left join t_dimensions dm2 on dm2.id=m.boxDimensions where sp.id=#{formid,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT b.ShipmentId shipmentid,a.marketplaceid,b.sku,chan.channame channel,company.simplename company, ifnull(b.received,0) reveiveQuantity, ts.arrivalTime,a.createdate, c.shiped_date ,ifnull(b.QuantityShipped,b.Quantity) Quantity, ts.outarrtime,ts.inarrtime, case when a.auditstatus =3 then case c.status when 1 then '等待确认' when 2 then '配货' when 0 then '取消货件' when 3 then '装箱' when 4 then '待发货' when 5 then '已发货' when 6 then '已完成' else '--' end else a.auditstatus end status, 'isbad' badstatus from t_erp_ship_v2_inboundplan a LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_v2_inboundshipment c on c.formid=a.id LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_v2_inboundshipment_item b on b.shipmentid=c.shipmentid LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inboundtrans ts on ts.shipmentid=c.shipment_confirmation_id LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_transdetail chan on chan.id=ts.channel LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_transcompany company on company.id=ts.company LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_status d on c.ShipmentStatus=d.`status` left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceid=a.marketplaceid where b.sku=#{sku,jdbcType=CHAR} and c.status=6 and b.received != b.QuantityShipped and (m.marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.region=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}) and a.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and c.shiped_date> date_add(now(), INTERVAL -6 month) ORDER BY a.createdate desc

SELECT ts.arrivalTime,ts.shipmentid,a.createdate, c.shiped_date ,b.sku sku, ifnull(ifnull(b.quantity,b.Quantity),0) Quantity,detail.channame channame, ifnull(ifnull(b.quantity,b.Quantity),0) - ifnull(b.received,0) shipQuantity from t_erp_ship_v2_inboundplan a LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_v2_inboundshipment c on c.formid=a.id LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_v2_inboundshipment_item b on b.shipmentid=a.shipmentid LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inboundtrans ts on ts.shipmentid=c.shipment_confirmation_id LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_status d on c.ShipmentStatus=d.`status` left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceid=a.marketplaceid left join t_erp_ship_transdetail detail on detail.id = ts.channel where b.sku=#{sku,jdbcType=CHAR} and c.status <= 5 and c.status >= 2 and (m.marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.region=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}) and a.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY ts.arrivalTime asc

SELECT a.marketplaceid, a.createdate, sum(b.Quantity) Quantity,max(s.status) status, max(st.name) shipmentstatus from t_erp_ship_v2_inboundplan a left join t_erp_ship_v2_inboundshipment s on s.formid=a.id left join t_erp_ship_status st on st.status=s.ShipmentStatus left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceid=a.marketplaceid LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_v2_inboundshipment_item b ON b.ShipmentId=s.ShipmentId where (a.marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.region=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}) and a.amazongroupid=#{groupid,jdbcType=CHAR} group by a.id ORDER BY a.createdate desc limit 0,4
